data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Larnaca, Cyprus that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Larnaca, Cyprus
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Larnaca access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.section_summary: On average, 11 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Larnaca, Cyprus.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
God, we pray for the believers in Larnaca, Cyprus that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.
Spirit, train the church of Larnaca, Cyprus to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Spirit, please convict each believer in Larnaca, Cyprus to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 147,094 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the state of Larnaca.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.section_summary:
the state of Larnaca, Cyprus has a population of 149,000.

We estimate Larnaca has 1,905 people who might know Jesus, 105,246 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 41,848 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 78 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Larnaca.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.
